subject: Re: [junit] Private method throws an exception
msgSnippet: ... Why does throwing the exception prevent you from completing your unit test? Can you try different inputs that won t cause the exception to be thrown? Is
messageBody:
mitchellch60 wrote:
> My method under test calls a private method in the same class. The
> private method throws an exception preventing me for completing my
> unit test.
>
> Any suggestions?

Why does throwing the exception prevent you from completing your unit test?

Can you try different inputs that won't cause the exception to be thrown?

Is there perhaps a defect in the private method? If so, can you make it
public so you can test it directly?
